tool_description: Checks which communication channels are available and functional for a specific customer.

customer_id.description: Customer identifier to check channel availability

channels_to_check.description: List of channels to verify (email, sms, push)

perform_validation.description: Whether to validate contact information format

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist.
Invalid channel list: One or more channel names are not supported.
Service check failed: Unable to verify channel availability at this time.
usage: Provide customer_id and list of channels_to_check. Set perform_validation to true to validate contact information format.

available_channels.description: List of available and functional channels

unavailable_channels.description: List of unavailable or non-functional channels

validation_errors.description: List of validation errors for contact information
